Subjects.Title: Product or Goods Market
Subjects.Description: It is the market for the goods and services to consumers.

Subjects.Title: Factor Market
Subjects.Description: It is the market for different factors of production such as raw materials, goods, services, etc used in the production or manufacturing.

Subjects.Title: Intermediate Goods
Subjects.Description: Goods or services used in the production of final goods. Example: Computer chip used in personal computers.

Subjects.Title: Demand and Supply
Subjects.Description: The relationship between price and quantity based on demand and supply of a product.

Subjects.Title: Demand
Subjects.Description: The quantity demanded by a consumer for the product will be higher when its price is lower.

Subjects.Title: Demand Function
Subjects.Description: It is the quantity demanded as a function of price of the good and other relevant data such as personal income.

Subjects.Title: Supply
Subjects.Description: The quantity supplied by the producer will be higher when the market price of the product is higher.

Subjects.Title: Supply Function
Subjects.Description: It is the quantity supplied as a function of price of the good/service and other relevant data such as technology, raw inputs, etc.
